profile.title: DATA SPECIALIST ROLE
profile.summary: Ensures the implementation of the organisations data management policy.
profile.mission: Ensures asset protection through the provision of clean, consistent, quality assured data. Maintains the integrity of data, stores and searches data and supports presentation of data analysis.

tasks.task: Define, build and optimise data models
Proactively protect confidentiality and security of data
Advise on appropriate data analytic methodology
Maintain data quality and compliance to legal standards
